title: It's your first week knowing Gen at Newcomb. The frisbee starts rolling dead-center toward midfield and Kevin instantly yells the exact phrase everyone repeats for years. What was it?
choice1: Kick it, but softly so we keep possession.
choice2: Step on it and reset from the sideline.
choice3: KICK THE SHIT OUT OF IT!!
choice4: Leave it and call dead disc.

title: At Kenji's mom's horror-movie nights, before thumbs-up/down replaced stars, what was the highest possible star rating on Netflix that we used to judge if the movie was trash or classic?
During mafia at Josh's parents' house, Gen suddenly disappears mid-game with zero explanation. Which option is the true memory?
choice1: He went to the bathroom and came back in 2 minutes.
choice2: He stepped outside to take a call.
choice3: He went to the kitchen for snacks.
choice4: He straight-up left without saying bye.

title: Second Hawaii trip: Gen, Kevin, Kenji, Austin, Tony, and Colin (who skipped the shot) take Kahlua shots together. What happened immediately after Tony's shot?
choice1: He said it was smooth and asked for another.
choice2: He threw up right after saying he never throws up from alcohol.
choice3: He blacked out on the spot.
choice4: He chased it with water and was totally fine.

title: Big Bear trip with Tyler driving and Gen/Josh in the Jeep turns into a brutal delay. After the breakdown and all the waiting, where had we actually made it on the mountain?
choice3: Somewhere in the early lower section.
choice4: Basically the very beginning of the mountain.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh night with Colin, Josh, Kevin, and Austin: Gen sets up gadget cards plus attack boost, declares attack, then Colin flips Ladybug and wipes the 4-stars. How did Gen actually react?
choice2: Took the L quietly and passed turn.
